transcription: This magic happens once a year, when the best dancers meet on the world's most incredible stage.  Come join this unforgettable experience featuring the world's best master teachers. Enjoy top quality teaching and unique dance workshops designed by the world's top dance masters. Take part in the sweeping dance celebration. Dance on the world's most sophisticated  sophisticated stages and do not forget, this only one of its kind in the world dance event will be broadcast on Zhenjiang TV. Including the World Belly Dance Awards with a $12,000 grand prize. Don't miss the opportunity of the year. Dance for Unity 2015.  you
